Redesign Website de Belas-Artes

The aim of this project is to develop a proposal to improve the website experience for the candidates.

The Challenge

A person interested in applying to a course in FBAUL? From the moment the candidate starts to research courses. Until the moment the candidate is accepted/rejected or drops out. We consider that from this moment on the candidate becomes a student.

Design process

Discover

    Research Goals

  • Understand the needs and expectations of the candidates
  • Identify strengths and pain points of the current website and the candidates' perceptions of it
  • Understand the application process and identify patterns, trends and best practices of several university websites

Define

Profiles

They are meant to help us identify the user’s needs and literacy level regarding university websites.

Site Map

At this stage we reorganized the website contents to have a foothold and allow an easier navigation. We had special attention to the courses and applications menus.
